Package project_2

Class Student

java.lang.Object
project_2.Student
Direct Known Subclasses:
NonResident, Resident
public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
The superclass that represents a Student. Has subclasses which are Resident and NonResident.
Author:
Kevin Cubillos, Ethan Chang
